title: PlayWithRiot - Come play Dominion!
body:
UPDATE 1 - 7:00PM: Hey I know there are some guys struggling to get in a game, the lobbies are filling up pretty fast. I'll be hosting these for as long as I can tonight and the regular Dominion players will likely keep going after that!

UPDATE 2 - 8:10 PM: Riot Zaps is on and creating lobbies as well. So 18 spots available to play!

UPDATE 3 - 12:00AM: That's it for me! 17 games since 5 PM, great effort everyone and GGWP. Zaps is still running a lobby and so are some community members such as MagicalLoliJuice.
Be sure to check out the final [Dominate Dominion tournament VOD](http://www.twitch.tv/dominategamingtv/v/48346192) if you missed it and want to see what competitive Dominion looks like.
If you just want to see what Dominion is all about, check [THIS comeback](http://www.twitch.tv/dominategamingtv/v/48346192?t=03h47m47s) out.

----

Hey Everyone!

I'm starting a Dominion customs train at **5:00 PM AEDT tonight!**

I'll be present in the DominateDominion, Dominion, and PlatWithRiot chat rooms and inviting whoever is around. Otherwise just look for "PlayWithRiot Dominion" in the custom game list.

Let's see how many games we can smash out before Dominion goes down.

Oh, ew no. This is why we play draft and permaban Heimer. It was Cheesy Ceddar wasn't it. haha
Lesson Learned: I should stay far (FAR!) away from Jhin!
I'd like to thank Gehirn and Zaps for hosting these Dominion games yesterday. T'was fun :D!
Thanks for coming along. Glad you enjoyed it. :D
I have no idea how to really play Dominion but I'm damn well gonna be there!

So uh,[ this video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mxDJTjng3_o) is a thing but it is REALLY old, so please excuse how everything looks. XD 

There have also been a couple of changes, like the addition of a trinket that stores Revives in charge form! (max 3 revives per game)

2011 :O dayum.

 I get capture points and stuff :P just none of the strategy. Like when should you go where? Who's good? Do you send 2 top 3 bot at the start of the game or do you just run around screaming "SOMEONE GIVE ME DIRECTIONS!!!! WHAT'S THE DRILL?!?!?! HOW DOES GARRISON WORK?!?!"

It's a circle! Really I just don't know what to do with that!

Long story short, if you get in a game with me, don't expect anything, and I mean ANYTHING. I'll probably just run around the map typing "choo choo all aboard the great circle line" trying to kill anyone who's red. :P

Generally at the start of the game, you send 1 bot, and 4 top - with one person capturing mid along the way.

There are some high level strats that involve whens and wheres but at the average level its fine to just play the game out without worrying too much about what to do.

In general you want to:

- hold mid and bot.
- fight for and maintain control of top.
- watch out for sneaky caps against your mid or ganks into the bot lane and adapt as needed.
- if you're really far ahead you can go for the enemy mid/bot for a significant cap advantage but be sure to back off when it's obvious that maintaining control of enemy mid will cost more than it's worth (don't get aced and then lose top, for example)

That and use your trinket to revive when you have a long death timer (> 20 seconds) and need to be somewhere fast! You start with one trinket revive charge and gain another charge at level 9 and 14.

That's it! Every other basic is covered in the video.

Hmm thanks so much! I'll try my hardest to beat you but I'm pretty sure I'm gonna get smashed :3

EDIT: So clutch :3 A worthy defeat
1 point remaining, 150+ points down. 5 cap on our end. [About as intense as it gets](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/122814915/200142281?tab=overview). GGWP!
I'm only a little bitter I swear :P
Ah... I just found it. Emissaries are definitely a good idea. GJ riot.
Why is your name in green?
[This is why!](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/Edu7E6Bp-introducing-the-emissaries)

Hey Riot Gehrin.
Could you please help with my {reported4verbal} account? You commented on my forum post about 11 days ago.
I am also unable to login to my forums page and support page so I am using this account (my son's account) and dI have to ask him to login and sit next to me while I try to get some help on the forums. 
Could you please help since you are a rioter? I am getting mysterious jinx with the picture of syndra to help me. she is trying to help but she said the information is wrong to recover my account. I had the same problem a week ago but I eventually proved after heaps of messages I own the account. Now they keep saying the info is wrong haha.

I think I am getting far with this mysterious jinx, but maybe you could add your 2 cents too.
I will keep checking this forum post, but may not be able to reply as I said before I can't login. I need my son to login to his forums account and sit next to me while I type this.

Thanks.  :)
